# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We actively provide security updates for the following versions of **Focusd**:

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| v1.x.x  | :white_check_mark: |
| < v1.0.0  | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

The Focusd team takes the security of our project seriously. If you believe you have found a security vulnerability, please report it to us as soon as possible.

### How to Report

We encourage you to reach out directly via email at:  
**mail@0xarchit.is-a.dev**

### What to Expect

- **Acknowledgment**: You can expect an acknowledgment of your report within **48 hours**.
- **Assessment**: We will conduct a thorough risk assessment and provide a status update within **7 days**.
- **Resolution**: Once a vulnerability is confirmed, we will work toward a fix and keep you informed of the progress.
- **Disclosure**: We follow responsible disclosure practices and will coordinate a public announcement (CVE if applicable) once a fix is available and users have had time to update.

### Privacy

Your reports are kept confidential. We will not disclose your identity without your explicit consent.

Thank you for helping keep Focusd secure!
